author: J. Edward Moreno
title: Hogan commits to producing racial breakdown of coronavirus cases
description: Maryland Gov. Larry Hogan (R) committed to producing coronavirus data broken down by race and ethnicity as soon as this week as calls grow for such numbers in the face of reports that COVID-19 is taking a disproportionall...
content: Maryland Gov. Larry Hogan (R) committed to producing coronavirus data broken down by race and ethnicity as soon as this week as calls grow for such numbers in the face of reports that COVID-19 is taking a disproportionally large toll on black and Latino commu… [+1418 chars]
